body.name: YIER Bluetooth Speakers, Wireless TWS Portable Speaker with Lights,100dB Loud Subwoofer 80w(Peak) Stereo Sound, Bassup Technology, Long Playtime for Outdoor Party
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 49 mins
features: 【Incredible Sound Loved by million people】YIER wireless bluetooth speaker has a 80w(Peak) output power and the latest 4 drivers. (2 full-range drivers and 2 tweeter driver). Meanwhile，it is debugged by professional audio engineers. So YIER wireless speakers get enhanced bass, tight mids and crystal clear highs without distortion at any volume. Its sound is loved by millions of listeners.

【Beast Stereo Sound & Advanced Bluetooth 5.0】YIER Wireless speaker equipped with state-of-the-art Bluetooth 5.0 technology, it can easily pair two bluetooth speakers. Press the TWS button and you will get immediately 160w stereo surround sound, let you enjoy the same sound as concerts and concerts at home. Besides, you can use it in the backyard jobsite garage garden kitchen beach,this speaker is enough to fill the house.

【Rich Punch Bass & Beats Driven Light Show】YIER party speaker is equipped with the latest bassup technology. Press this Bass button, this speaker will packs a punch and is enough to fill the whole party with music. And with the excellent rhythm light show, your party will more shine. Let's start preparing for summer vacations and parties.

【Wooden Speaker】What makes the 'perfect' speaker enclosure? -Definitely a wood framed speaker. Beacuse Wood naturally non-resonant, so energising a speaker box with musical vibrations will result in minimal distortion. Wood has a high density, It has been used for centuries to help amplify a richer, clearer sound in instruments from guitars to grand pianos. So a speaker enclosure made of wood, and made well, will naturally sound good.

【12 Months Warranty Service】Enhance your Christmas party atmosphere with our portable speaker. This special package includes 1 speaker, 1 USB-C cable, 1 AUX cable, and 1 user manual. The speaker is equipped with 4 high-capacity rechargeable batteries, each with a capacity of 2500mAh, providing a total of 10000mAh for extended usage. Enjoy 4-18 hours of battery life, depending on your volume and lighting mode preferences. Rest assured, all YIER products come with a 12-month warranty and 24-hour online customer service. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Sound Design By YIER, Tuned for your ears. Why not choose the Portable Party Speaker with punchy pass ? YIER Bluetooth Speaker equips with 80w（Peak） of stereo audio drivers speaker and advanced digital signal processor,handmade wooden box.It bring you impressive Hi-Fi quality.Dive into super bass sound when party time or movie. Full the massive room without question.you can take YIER Bluetooth speaker from the pool parties, BBQs to weekend road trips.

Party Light Show-- You Can See The Music! Excellent rhythm10-Color Breathinglight show, your party will more shine.Easily operate the light, Just press the "sun" button and the light is in your hands. You can switch 4 light modes. Support different Music Source input TF Card SlotMIC Slot (3.5mm microphone Slot)AUX Slot (3.5mm Audio jack)USB Slot (charge or Play song)Type C Slot (charge only) Wireless Stereo Pairing You can purchase two speakers at the same time to truly enjoy the surround sound of a movie theater by using the Dual Pairing function, it's an auditory experience that's truly unparalleled.

How to Pair Two YIER Bluetooth Speakers Turn on the two speakers.Long press one of the TWS buttons on both machines.Wait for a few seconds, when the speaker prompts "TWS paired", it means the two speakers are connected successfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality speakers at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: Some of the best speakers I've purchased. The bass is incredible and the sound can get super loud especially for speakers that are smaller and portable. I really recommend purchasing these if you are looking for good quality speakers at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small... but Mighty!!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is freakin AWESOME!! Compact but loud!! The flashing neon lights are very cool too. I will most likely buy another one of these, if this stays awesome for some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the size, sound quality, and easy connection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is good for my needs.
reviews.reviewText: I brought this to use outside for an outdoor theater for my hot tub. This thing was loud enough to hear, but just not loud enough over the full jets of the hot tub. The bass is pretty good and the trebble for vocals was great for the purpose. I was so impressed that I brought a second speaker hopefully to overcome the issues when the hot tub is actually in full use with all the jets going. It paired easily to my phone too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great price! great product
reviews.reviewText: Product works great. Sounds is loud and clear. Good low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of bang for your buck!!
reviews.reviewText: I teach a spin class and the sound system went out at the gym, so I purchased this! So glad I did!! Everyone says it sounds like I hired a professional DJ!! Great sound quality!! Super lightweight, and charges fast!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stop looking...this trumps all at price point.
reviews.reviewText: quality product...exceeded expectations. I ended up buying two as shelf speakers. Easy to connect...Superior bass for what you get...its just a great product...I tried several around this price...beat them all, easily. The craftmanship is excellent. I wish it went louder, but it is loud, I'm just deaf. Look at wattage...it's there. No loss at higher volume. Pair with it the 2nd speaker effortlessly...just a push of the button. The lcd settings are awesome.
